repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: Titles of the different stotras are written in the margin but the beginning of new stotra has not seen exactly. It needs more research to find out the exact stotras, however according to VOHD II,7: p: 912, entry. 2639 there are more than 29 stotras.

msItem.title: Stotrasaṃgraha
msItem.incipit:
1v 1 śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāryaḥ kavitārkkikakesarī vedāntācāryavaryoḥ me sannidatāṃ sadā hṛdi . śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ . vinadaśikharaṃ sa (gap of approximately 20 syllables due to broken edge.) 1v 2 la havyavāhanaḥ . kallaśajaladhīkanyāvallarīkalpaśākhī kalayatu kuśalannaḥ kopi kāruṇyarāśīḥ 2 yasyānubhāvamadhīgantumaśaknuvanto muhyantyabhaṅguradhīyo munisārva[bhaumāḥ]
3v 1 ve dāntagurave namaḥ. hariḥ oṃ. varadapañcāśatsaṃpūrṇaṃ .śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāryaḥ kavitārkkikakesarī vedāntācāryavaryoḥ me sannidatāṃ sadā hṛdi 5v 7 dha? pāthaśca dātho?rohasadohasu bhagavato mā svaṃ vapuḥ pātu naḥ adyāsubhuvanatrayīmanibutaṃ kaṇḍuyat bhāti (8 syllables illegible due to broken edge.)
msItem.explicit: 78v 1 śramovyarthaprayāsso mā bhūḥ pariśramaścātrakaraṇakalevarapradānādyetadavasthāprāpaṇaparyantaṃ atra yayā sārvabhaumasya mahādhyāsahetukāra koṭikaṃbālyā (2 syllables illegible.) 78v 2 vacanādikamapiviśikṣayitvā tatparitāge hariḥ oṃ śrīkṛṣṇārpaṇāmastu karakṛtamaparādhaṃ kṣantumarhanti santaḥ . śrimate vedantamahāgurave namaḥ.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left margin on the vesro of the folio.
supportDesc.condition: good with some palm leaves are cracked

additions.desc: varadarājapañcāśat hariḥ oṃ. is written in the left margin on 1v.
On 5v in the left margin new stotra title - daśāvatārastotraṃ.

encodingDesc.p: Space is added to separate words.
